ajito_aku_010_sitappa_b_01:
Up ahead’s the base of operations for Team
Star’s Dark crew.\c
You may know us as the Segin Squad![VAR 0114(002E)]
ajito_aku_010_sitappa_a_02:
Yup! And we don’t take too kindly to random
kids sniffing around our turf.[VAR 0114(002D)]
ajito_aku_010_sitappa_b_02:
Sorry, but if you don’t turn yourself around here,
amig[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0101)]oa, we’ll have to send you packing![VAR 0114(002E)]
ajito_aku_010_sitappa_a_03:
Wait, hold up...\c
Just going on a hunch here, but...are you that
[VAR TRNAME(0000)] kid?[VAR 0114(002D)]
ajito_aku_010_sitappa_a_04:
Y’know, that piece of work we’re out to get for
declaring war on Team Star?[VAR 0114(002D)]
ajito_aku_010_sitappa_b_03:
“Maybe I am,” [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she says. Cool as a cucumber!
Honesty’s not always the best policy, you know...[VAR 0114(002E)]
ajito_aku_010_sitappa_b_04:
Talk about suspicious! That’s exactly what
someone trying to slip under the radar would say![VAR 0114(002E)]
ajito_aku_010_sitappa_a_05:
Ugh, you know what? Doesn’t matter who you
are. You’re not gettin’ through.\c
Buzz off or get thrashed by me in battle, kid.
What’ll it be?[VAR 0114(002D)]
ajito_aku_010_select_04: I’ll get out of your hair...
ajito_aku_010_sitappa_b_05: Have a nice walk back, then! Hasta la vistar! ☆[VAR 0114(002E)]
ajito_aku_010_sitappa_a_06:
Graaah! Sassy kids like you are the worst!
That’s it—prepare to get stomped into the dirt![VAR 0114(002D)]
ajito_aku_010_sitappa_a_07: Graaah! How the heck could I lose?![VAR 0114(002D)]
ajito_aku_010_sitappa_a_08:
Well, whatever, it’s your problem now! Finish up
here for me, would ya, bud?[VAR 0114(002D)]
ajito_aku_010_sitappa_b_08:
She’s new to the team, y’know. Might have to
have a little chat with her about that attitude...[VAR 0114(002E)]
ajito_aku_010_sitappa_b_10:
Well, I’m gonna go into the base now and
give the rest of the squad the heads-up.[VAR 0114(002E)]
ajito_aku_010_sitappa_b_11:
We’ll come at you full force if you set foot
inside, so you might wanna consider turning tail.\r
Either way, best of luck to you, amig[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0101)]oa![VAR 0114(002E)]
